data.actual_result: Regardless of the number of tabs preceding a line, the line will be displayed as being indented only once. This does not appear to be a firefox bug, as   displays tabs correctly.
data.expected_result: The indentation of each line should be proportional to the number of tabs preceding them.
data.short_description: On firefox, lines indented with tabs only display a single indentation
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on firefox - write, in a code block, a line with multiple tabs at the beginning
